parameters: <ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>

\N<Fubii>Hey, what brings you here? It's rare for you to come visit
from Auntie's place.

\N<Segi>...I have something to discuss with you. It's about Rame-
chan.

\N<Fubii>Oh, is that all? You came storming in with such a serious
face, I thought it was something major.

\N<Fubii>Really, what a letdown. I thought you were going to say
you're so horny you can't stand it and ask me to hold you.

\N<Segi>Don't joke around. I heard from Irime-san... Rame-chan's
mother, that she's been feeling depressed lately.
\N<Fubii>Huh, and? What's that got to do with me?
\N<Segi>...Don't you have any idea why that might be?
\N<Fubii>Any idea, huh...

\N<Segi>It's no use trying to dodge the question. Tell me. I won't
move from here until you do.
\N<Fubii>Ahaha, who said anything about dodging?
\N<Fubii>Sure, if it's ideas you want, I've got them to spare.
\N<Segi>...What do you mean?

\N<Fubii>You were probably asked by her mom, right? To ask Riia about
how she's doing and then come to me. Am I wrong?

\N<Segi>That's right. If you know that much, this will be quick. If
you know something, speak up already.

\N<Fubii>Hmm, I could tell you, but it wouldn't be free. After all,
there's nothing in it for me.

\N<Segi>We're not talking about profit and loss here. Just speak up
already.

\N<Segi>Besides... if you do have any idea what's going on, stop
involving yourself with her immediately.

\N<Fubii>No, no, what right does Auntie have to say such things? What
I do with her is none of Auntie's business, right?

\N<Segi>Didn't I tell you? I heard it from her mother. It's as good
as if she asked me herself.

\N<Fubii>But still, that doesn't mean I have to listen to what Auntie
says.
\N<Segi>Then... what should we do?
\N<Segi>...Don't be ridiculous, why would I go on a date with you...

\N<Fubii>To get the story from me. Just think of it as a simple
exchange. I'll keep my promise. It's not a bad deal for
Auntie, I think?
\N<Segi>...
\N<Fubii>Hey, ma'am. Do you still need something?

\N<Fubii>Oh, are you going to let me do it again? Ahaha, you sure
spread your legs easily for an old lady.
\N<Segi>...
